name: Rails app
body:
### Welcome to Rails app.
This is a micro-blog system, host on [Heroku](heroku.com), here is [demo site](https://pacific-everglades-2293.herokuapp.com/)

This system build by Ruby on Rails.


## Design process.

###Development environments
```
#Install rvm
curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s

#You can then get Ruby set up by examining the requirements for installing it:
rvm requirements

#I needed to tell RVM where OpenSSL was located when installing Ruby 2.0.0:
rvm install 2.0.0 --with-openssl-dir=$HOME/.rvm/usr

#Install RubyGems:
#download gems and install
#Install Rails
gem install rails --version 4.0.0 --no-ri --no-rdoc

#Start the application
rails new rails_app

#Bundle install
bundle update && bundle install

#Run server
rails server
```

##To be continued.
